text: Takes years of practice, of course, and I'm so, so old.

passages.fragment: Takes years of practice , of course ,
passages.full_quote: <used>Takes years of practice, of course, s</used>ecretary Susan at the office, not you, of course

passages.source_name: Long Dark Teatime Of The Soul
passages.full_quote: There are certain sensitivities involved, <used>of course, and I'm</used> also in a position to be able to make a lot of things happen

passages.source_name: Long Dark Teatime Of The Soul
passages.full_quote: It's been so, so, so long, <used>and I'm so, so old</used>
